com.zorben.dns.message

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zorben.dns.message.Message

  • public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for parsing and storing DNS Message data.
    Data in this class is parsed according to RFC 1035 Section 4.
    Author:
    Mac Crompton
    See Also:
    RFC 1035 Section 4

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.ArrayList<ResourceRecord> additional
      the additional records section contains ResourceRecords which relate to the query, but are not strictly answers for the question.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<ResourceRecord> answers
      The answer section contains ResourceRecords that answer the question.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<ResourceRecord> authorities
      The authority section contains ResourceRecords that point toward an authoritative name server.
      protected MessageHeader header
      The MessageHeader section is always present.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<MessageQuestion> questions
      The MessageQuestion section contains fields that describe a question to a name server.

    • Field Detail

      • header

        protected MessageHeader header
        The MessageHeader section is always present. The header includes fields that specify which of the remaining sections are present, and also specify whether the message is a query or a response, a standard query or some other opcode, etc.

      • questions

        protected java.util.ArrayList<MessageQuestion> questions
        The MessageQuestion section contains fields that describe a question to a name server. These fields are a query type (QTYPE), a query class (QCLASS), and a query domain name (QNAME).

      • answers

        protected java.util.ArrayList<ResourceRecord> answers
        The answer section contains ResourceRecords that answer the question.

      • authorities

        protected java.util.ArrayList<ResourceRecord> authorities
        The authority section contains ResourceRecords that point toward an authoritative name server.

      • additional

        protected java.util.ArrayList<ResourceRecord> additional
        the additional records section contains ResourceRecords which relate to the query, but are not strictly answers for the question.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Message

        public Message()
        Constructs a Message with a random id and default MessageHeader parameters.

      • Message

        public Message(MessageHeader header)
        Constructs a Message with the provided MessageHeader.
        Parameters:
        header - The MessageHeader containing information about this Message. Describing the type of operations expected from this Message.

      • Message

        public Message(byte[] data,
               int start)
        Constructs a Message from raw byte data and a starting byte offset. This constructor assumes a properly formatted DNS Message at the specified start offset.
        Parameters:
        data - A byte array containing the DNS Message to be parsed.
        start - An integer specifying the byte at which the Message starts in the data array.
        See Also:
        RFC 1035 Section 4.1 - Message Format

    • Method Detail

      • addQuestion

        public void addQuestion(MessageQuestion question)
        Adds a MessageQuestion to this Message to be queried.
        Parameters:
        question - The MessageQuestion to be added to this Message.

      • toByteArray

        public byte[] toByteArray()
        A method for converting this Message into a properly formatted byte array for sending over the network.
        Returns:
        The properlty formatted byte array.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representing this Message. The string is in an easy to read format for debugging purposes.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • getHeader

        public MessageHeader getHeader()
        Returns:
        The MessageHeader defining this Message.

      • getQuestions

        public java.util.ArrayList<MessageQuestion> getQuestions()
        Returns:
        The list of MessageQuestions being asked by this Message.

      • getAnswers

        public java.util.ArrayList<ResourceRecord> getAnswers()
        Returns:
        The list of ResourceRecords answering the queries asked by this Message.

      • getAuthorities

        public java.util.ArrayList<ResourceRecord> getAuthorities()
        Returns:
        The list of ResourceRecords representing authority servers related to queries asked by this Message.

      • getAdditional

        public java.util.ArrayList<ResourceRecord> getAdditional()
        Returns:
        The list of additional ResourceRecords attached to the queries asked by this Message.
